meanings.sent1: Her unskillfulness in painting was evident from the messy canvas.
meanings.sent2: The team's unskillfulness in soccer was apparent during the match.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unskillfulness in cooking, she still tried to bake a cake for her friend.
meanings.sent4: His unskillfulness in public speaking was like a stumbling block in his career.
meanings.sent5: The unskillfulness of the new employee stood out among the experienced staff.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unskilled.
meanings.sent1: The unskillfulness of the workers led to many mistakes in the project.
meanings.sent2: She showed unskillfulness in handling delicate equipment.
meanings.sent3: The unskillfulness of the magician made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His unskillfulness in negotiation was like a barrier to reaching a deal.
meanings.sent5: The unskillfulness of the student was evident in his test results.

meanings.sent1: The unskillfulness of the chef resulted in a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent2: His unskillfulness in driving led to a minor accident.
meanings.sent3: The unskillfulness of the comedian made the audience laugh even more.
meanings.sent4: Her unskillfulness in organization was like a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent5: The unskillfulness of the detective delayed solving the case.
